schema:creator: Eastman, Jervie Henry
schema:description: Close-up of plaque on rock with message reading "Dedicated to the MEMORY OF PIONEER STAGE DRIVERS 1854 KNIGHTS OF THE WHIP 1887 TO THE PIONEERS OF STAGE AND TEAM WHO BLAZED THIS TRAIL AND CROSSED THE STREAM ~ TO YOU WHOSE COURAGE LED YOU ON THROUGH TRIALS AND HARDSHIPS FOUGHT AND WON TO YOU WHOSE FAITH IN GOD AND MAN INSPIRED THE WORK OF THIS GREAT SPAN WITH PRIDE AND HOMAGE EVER TRUE "THIS BRIDGE" WE DEDICATE TO YOU Erected August 29, 1931." Lower right corner reads "J.H. Eastman."
schema:name: At Bridge over Shasta River, near Yreka, Calif
schema:publisher: University of California, Davis. General Library. Dept. of Special Collections
